basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Abdullah Arif. Recently, I have graduated as a Computer Science student from the University of Windsor. You can browse my project section to see some of the things I have created over the years. There are three reasons why I usually start working on a project. One, it seems like an interesting idea; for example, a library website for Hogwarts. I had a blast trying to think of things wizards and witches would find useful on a library website. Two, I am trying to learn some concepts or technology. For example, I created the automated spear-phisher so I could learn more about phishing attacks. Lastly, it something that's inherently useful. An example of this is my Amazon deal finder.

projects.title: Automated Spear-phisher
projects.description: A security research tool to send targeted spam messages on either Facebook or Twitter. The program analyzes the feed of its target to increase the effectiveness of the messages.

projects.title: Image Repository
projects.description: A full-stack image repository, where users can store their files. Created a GCP cloud function to implement CP-ABE encryption and used it to ensure files are secure at rest.

projects.title: Keystroke Dynamics Spoofer
projects.description: A program that authenticates users based on their typing patterns. And a spoofer that uses the genetic algorithm to mimic the userâ€™s typing pattern.

projects.title: Modern Deedy
projects.description: A latex resume template, that combines the layout of Jake's resume with the gloss of Deedy's resume

projects.title: Distributed Key-Value Store
projects.description: A distributed key-value store which automatically replicates data in the background while the user manages their data. Implemented a custom P2P protocol to maximize fault tolerance and scalability.

projects.title: War of Weebles
projects.description: A capture-the-flag-styled shooting game composed of AI-controlled players. The agents change their goals based on various factors, such as their health, current weapon, their personality and what they see.
